english.segment1: Through this silent night I've been watching the sky. I've been following the brightest star with my eyes.. Saviour is born.. Rejoice!
english.segment2: I thought this was another night ruled by penetrating darkness, but the star I saw was a sign of something else. The star had stopped above this place. Following it here I found Him.
english.segment3: Holy night of the Saviour's birth, little child in manger. We respect the spirit of Christmas as we celebrate the Christ Mass..
english.segment4: There He was; a little child, yet glowing with divinity, I was allowed to kneel before and to worship Him. With my mind and in my heart. I could feel He is the Lord.
english.segment5: This was a night of joy but as well a night of grief. Herod gave an order to kill 'cause his fear for this King.. Saviour is born. Rejoice!
english.segment6: "For my eyes have seen Your salvation which You have prepared, in the sight of all people, a light for revelation, to the Gentiles and for Glory, to Your people Israel." -Luke 2:30-32
english.segment7: Holy night of the Saviour's birth, little child in manger. We respect the spirit of Christmas as we celebrate the Christ Mass.. Christ Mass..
